snippet.title: Droplette Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2745370/Droplette
Itch.io: https://rivero7462.itch.io/droplette

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/K4dj6RT

Trailer music by Machina: https://soundcloud.com/machina-music-828416267

Droplette is a cozy puzzle platformer where a spirited girl named Droplette learns and uses element-based abilities on the environment around her to rescue the droplet boy, Driplet! Shoot versatile projectiles and transform through obstacles in this watery world.
